thread.title: Akdong Musician’s Lee Soo Hyun Talks About Going Bowling With A Male Idol On “Radio Star”
thread.title_full: Akdong Musician’s Lee Soo Hyun Talks About Going Bowling With A Male Idol On “Radio Star”

author: choralee
title: Akdong Musician’s Lee Soo Hyun Talks About Going Bowling With A Male Idol On “Radio Star”
text:
Display.Sharethrough.Soompi.1x1 
Akdong Musician’s Lee Soo Hyun recently talked about how she went bowling with a male idol! 
On the upcoming March 15 broadcast of MBC’s “Radio Star,” Akdong Musician appears as a guest for a special episode about family. 
During the recording of the episode, Lee Soo Hyun is asked about whether or not she went bowling with a male idol. Surprised at the sudden question, she honestly responds, “It’s true, because we’re very close [friends]…” and explains that she is just a “bowling member.” Her comment then causes everyone to become curious about the identity of the male idol. Her brother Lee Chan Hyuk’s reaction to her story is also said to have caused much laughter. 
Lee Soo Hyun also talks about having a “fake boyfriend commotion.” In order to rebel against her brother’s overprotectiveness, she reveals a time when she created a fake boyfriend and was able to perfectly trick Lee Chan Hyuk. 
Lee Chan Hyuk’s reaction to his sister’s story about going bowling with a male idol will be featured on the upcoming episode of “Radio Star” on March 15 at 11:10 p.m. KST. 
Meanwhile, catch the latest episode below!
